title: Centre Name - Facilities
content: This centre offers a 25m swimming pool, gym with cardio and weights, sauna, steam room, and sports hall.

title: Centre Name - Classes
content: Available classes: Yoga (Mon/Wed 6pm), Spin (Tue/Thu 7pm), Pilates (Fri 5pm), Aqua Aerobics (Sat 10am).
